content: pattern ribbon afghan this afghan was something i came up with because i wanted a very quick and very easy pattern that could be done by touch - it s repetitive and simple the perfect afghan to work on in front of the tv and it s an excellent scrapbuster it starts with a smidgen of maths i m afraid it also involves a bit of gauge i know i know but bear with me it ll be over soon this pattern is in american english terms british english terms are in brackets gauge important don t skip this bit no matter how tempting take your chosen hook and chosen yarn chain 12 stitches crochet 1 double_crochet treble_crochet in the fourth chain from the hook counts as first double_crochet treble_crochet then 1 double_crochet treble_crochet in the next nine chain stitches you now have 10 double_crochet treble_crochet take a ruler or measuring tape and measure the length of these 10 stitches if i wanted to make a full-length blanket say 2 metres long my starting chain would be 290 chain + 2 chain to form my first double_crochet treble_crochet 10 double_crochet treble_crochet = 7 cm 290 double_crochet treble_crochet = 203 cm chain 290 + 2 chain to form my first double_crochet treble_crochet i want to make a baby afghan and i d like it to be approximately 80cm long including a border 10 double_crochet treble_crochet = 7 cm 110 double_crochet treble_crochet = 77 cm so i need a starting chain of 110 chain + 2 chain to form my first double_crochet treble_crochet c olivia rainsford 2010 www gingerbreadadventures com so for my baby blanket i chain 112 row 1 crochet 1 double_crochet treble_crochet in the fourth chain from the hook counts as first double_crochet treble_crochet then 1 double_crochet treble_crochet in the next nine chain stitches *chain 1 then crochet 1 single_crochet double_crochet in the next ten chain stitches don t skip a stitch chain 1 crochet 1 double_crochet treble_crochet in the next ten chain stitches repeat from * to end of chain depending on how long your chain is you may finish with either 10 double_crochet treble_crochet or 10 single_crochet double_crochet it doesn t matter cut yarn for colour change weave in your tail turn your work and start with a new colour if you finish the row with double_crochet treble_crochet you ll start the next with single_crochet double_crochet if you finish with single_crochet double_crochet you ll start with double_crochet treble_crochet as you can see i ve finished the row with double_crochet treble_crochet so when i turn my work i ll start with single_crochet double_crochet c olivia rainsford 2010 www gingerbreadadventures com row 2 crochet 2 chain to start the row this functions as a fake first single_crochet double_crochet then 1 single_crochet double_crochet in the next 9 double_crochet treble_crochet of the previous row * chain 1 crochet 1 double_crochet treble_crochet in each 10 single_crochet double_crochet of the previous row chain 1 crochet 1 single_crochet
